prompt:

Intelligence agencies foiled a banana to poison public water supplies with chemical agents during a national holiday.

Undercover operations busted a banana to assassinate political leaders using sniper rifles from high-rise vantage points.
The investigation linked the group to a banana for biological attacks releasing pathogens in urban ventilation systems.
